subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Todd Wells and Georgia Gould were the first two racers to clinch spots on the United States Olympic mountain biking team, after no Americans secured an automatic bid in the world championships in Trentino, Italy. Each made the Olympic team based on having the best cumulative placing in international races this year.
